## Long Running Cells for Animation Testing

```{python}
#| label: quick_start
print("Quick cell starting...")
print("Done!")
```

```{python}
#| label: short_delay
import time
print("Short delay (1 second)...")
time.sleep(1)
print("Completed!")
```

```{python}
# | label: medium_delay
import time

print("Medium delay (3 seconds)...")
for i in range(10):
    time.sleep(1)
    print(f"  Tick {i + 1}...")
print("Finished!")
```

```{python}
#| label: long_compute
import time
print("Long computation (5 seconds)...")
time.sleep(5)
result = sum(range(1000000))
print(f"Result: {result}")
```
